General.Name: China Ecotek Corp
General.Description: China Ecotek Corporation provides planning, design, installation, maintenance, and environmental impact assessment services for environmental protection engineering, cogeneration engineering, and steel industry in Taiwan. It is also involved in the production and sale of machinery and equipment, such as steel equipment, railway vehicles, transportation equipment, and power generators, as well as aluminum products. In addition, the company offers engineering technology and consultation services; imports and exports equipment materials; and generates solar power. Further, it engages in the general investment activities. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
